releaseMessage: You can listen to "Atrapado en el tiempo" now!

gig.title: Sweet Q + Madame Christie
gig.text: On Friday, March 8th we'll present 'Atrapado en el tiempo' at sala Vesta together with Madame Christie. Do not miss the opportunity to experience this party full of intensity, emotions and good vibes.

info.title: Atrapado en el tiempo
info.subtitle: Release on January 26th
info.text: Next January 26th will be available on all platforms 'Atrapado en el tiempo', the second single of our next LP. A powerful and reflective indie track that invites you to break with the daily monotony, transforming the down moments into opportunities for liberation. Its positive character will immerse you in the intensity of living each day as if it were the last. Be the first to listen to it!

pressKit.title: Press kit
pressKit.text: Here you can download our press kit

videoclip.title: Coming soon...
videoclip.text: Soon we will release our third videoclip 'Las cosas claras'. Stay tuned with our social networks!

stayTuned: At this time we haven't any gig scheduled soon. Stay tuned!

tickets.20240121: Tickets Vesta March 8: Sweet Q + Madame Christie

mercadoMotores.title: Mercado de Motores
mercadoMotores.subtitle: Full show on Youtube
mercadoMotores.text: You can already watch our latest full live show at Mercado de Motores in our Youtube channel. If you want to hear our new forthcoming releases in a live format... Don't miss it out!
